thread.section_title: the Quin - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comfort and Class
thread.title_full: Comfort and Class - Review of the Quin, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: David W
title: Comfort and Class
text: Enjoyed a five nights stay here recently. Staff were very welcoming and attentive and we were upgraded to deluxe double, without even asking, nice touch. Rooms are reasonably spacious and very clean. Traffic noise is noticeable but that's New York for you. Special mention to the concierge service for sorting out show tickets at short notice.
